caption.center: STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA v. KEVIN RONALD PETERSON.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of June 2004 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of February 2005.
